      • handleGet

        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> handleGet(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> obj)

        A function that get objects from the DB and calls parse. after parse it pushes the data back as a report

        Parameters:
        obj - - an array list of objects the represent row in survey table in DB.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of Objects with all the information that related to the asking report SS * @throws Exception This function uses parse that can throw an exception

        Function to get surveys by specific store

        Parameters:

        stratDate - - start date range
        endDate - - end date range
        Returns:
        generic object arrayList which become survey arrayList
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Context.clientConsole.handleMessageFromClientUI throws SQLException
